level.heading: Temporary registration.
level.text: The Mayor may issue a temporary certificate of registration while an application for registration or renewal of registration is pending.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in ยง 47-2887.03.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 14-107
level.text: For D.C. Law 14-107, see notes following ยง 47-2887.01.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based upon ยง 8 of the Uniform Athlete Agents Act.
